New Medal Instituted
articles.content:
New Medal Instituted 
   Pyongyang, May 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK instituted a medal for honoring members of the Speed Campaign Youth Shock Brigade (SCYSB) who make a positive contribution to building a great prosperous powerful socialist nation, fully demonstrating the invincible spirit and militancy of the young vanguard in the Songun era with intense loyalty to the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader.
 A decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly on instituting the Service Medal of the SCYSB was promulgated on May 10.    
 Founded in May Juche 64 (1975), the SCYSB is a regular militant unit taking the lead in the hard and difficult fields of socialist economic construction true to the WPK's plan for building a great prosperous powerful nation and an organized one training young people as reliable heirs to the Party in practice.

Congratulations to Cambodian King
articles.content:
Congratulations to Cambodian King
   Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni on his 53rd birthday.
 The message sincerely wished the king good health and happiness and great success in accomplishing the noble cause for the well-being of the people.

articles.title: Delegation of WPK Leaves for Cuba
articles.content:
Delegation of WPK Leaves for Cuba
   Pyongyang, May 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of its Central Committee, left here on Saturday to visit Cuba.
 It was seen off at the airport by Pak Kyong Son, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, officials concerned and Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Ruben Perez Valdes.
